user.title: Routinely
user.description: Set up Routinely timer-guided routine execution.

data_description.enable_notifications: Send notifications with TTS announcements to mobile devices
data_description.notification_targets: Select devices to receive routine notifications (iOS/Android apps)
data_description.default_advancement_mode: Default mode for new tasks (auto, manual, confirm)
data_description.enable_tts: Announce task changes via smart speakers
data_description.tts_entity: Entity ID of media player for TTS (e.g., media_player.living_room)
data_description.log_level: Logging verbosity level (debug shows detailed diagnostics)

notifications.title: Notification Timings
notifications.description: Configure when to send task notifications. Enter comma-separated minutes (e.g., '10,5,1' for 10, 5, and 1 minute warnings).

data_description.notify_before_str: e.g., '10,5,1' for 10, 5, and 1 minute before next task
data_description.notify_on_start: Send notification when each task begins
data_description.notify_on_complete: Send notification when task is completed
